arabicText: قُلْ أَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ ۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيْهِ مَا حُمِّلَ وَعَلَيْكُم مَّا حُمِّلْتُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوهُ تَهْتَدُوا۟ ۚ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	“Obey	Allah	and	obey	the	Noble	
Messenger;	so	if	you	turn	away,	then	the	
Noble	Messenger	is	bound	only	for	what	
is	obligatory	upon	him,	and	upon	you	is	
the	duty	placed	upon	you”;	and	if	you	
obey	the	Noble	Messenger,	you	will	attain	
guidance;	and	the	Noble	Messenger	is	not	
liable	except	to	plainly	convey.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	ḥukm	māno	Allah	ka	aur	
ḥukm	māno	Rasool	ka	phir	agar	tum	muñh	
phero	to	Rasool	ke	zimme	wohi	hai	jo	
uspar	lāzim	kiya	gayā	aur	tum	par	woh	hai	
jiska	bojh	tumpar	rakhā	gayā	aur	agar	
rasool	ki	farmabardāri	karoge	rāh	pāoge	
aur	Rasool	ke	zimme	nahiñ	magar	sāf	
pahuñchā	denā

arabicText: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَيَسْتَخْلِفَنَّهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمَا ٱسْتَخْلَفَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَلَيُمَكِّنَنَّ لَهُمْ دِينَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى ٱرْتَضَىٰ لَهُمْ وَلَيُبَدِّلَنَّهُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَوْفِهِمْ أَمْنًۭا ۚ يَعْبُدُونَنِى لَا يُشْرِكُونَ بِى شَيْـًۭٔا ۚ وَمَن كَفَرَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Allah	has	promised	those	among	you	who	
believe	and	do	good	deeds,	that	He	will	
certainly	give	them	the	Caliphate	in	the	
earth	the	way	He	gave	to	those	before	
them;	and	that	He	will	certainly	establish	
for	them	their	religion	which	He	has	
chosen	for	them,	and	will	turn	their	prior	
fear	into	peace;	they	must	worship	Me	
and	not	ascribe	anything	as	a	partner	to	
Me;	and	whoever	is	ungrateful	after	this	–	
it	is	they	who	are	the	disobedient.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ne	w’āda	diyā	unko	jo	tum	meiñ	se	
Imān	lāye	aur	achchhe	kām	kiye	ke	zaroor	
unheiñ	zameen	meiñ	khilāfat	degā	jaisi	us	
se	pehloñ	ko	di	aur	zaroor	unke	liye	jamā	
degā	unkā	woh	deen	jo	unke	liye	pasand	
farmāyā	hai	aur	zaroor	unke	agle	khauf	ko	
amn	se	badal	degā,	meri	ibādat	kareiñ	
merā	shareeq	kisi	ko	na	thehrāyeiñ	aur	jo	
iske	b’ad	na-shukri	kare	to	wohi	log	be
ḥukm	haiñ

arabicText: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	keep	the	prayer	established	and	pay	
the	obligatory	charity	and	obey	the	Noble	
Messenger,	in	the	hope	of	attaining	mercy.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Namāz	barpā	rakho	aur	Zakāt	do	aur	
Rasool	ki	farma	bardāri	karo	is	ummeed	
par	ke	tum	par	raḥem		ho

arabicText: لَا تَحْسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مُعْجِزِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ ۖ وَلَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
Do	not	ever	think	that	the	disbelievers	
can	escape	from	Our	control	in	the	land;	
and	their	destination	is	the	fire;	and	
indeed	what	a	wretched	outcome!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hargiz	kāfiroñ	ko	khayāl	na	karnā	ke	woh	
kahiñ	hamāre	qābu	se	nikal	jāyeiñ	zameen	
meiñ	aur	unkā	thikānā	āag	hai	aur	zaroor	
kya	hi	burā	anjām

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لِيَسْتَـْٔذِنكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُكُمْ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَمْ يَبْلُغُوا۟ ٱلْحُلُمَ مِنكُمْ ثَلَـٰثَ مَرَّٰتٍۢ ۚ مِّن قَبْلِ صَلَوٰةِ ٱلْفَجْرِ وَحِينَ تَضَعُونَ ثِيَابَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظَّهِيرَةِ وَمِنۢ بَعْدِ صَلَوٰةِ ٱلْعِشَآءِ ۚ ثَلَـٰثُ عَوْرَٰتٍۢ لَّكُمْ ۚ لَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَا عَلَيْهِمْ جُنَاحٌۢ بَعْدَهُنَّ ۚ طَوَّٰفُونَ عَلَيْكُم بَعْضُكُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	The	slaves	you	
possess	and	those	among	you	who	have	
not	attained	adulthood,	must	seek	your	
permission	on	three	occasions;	before	the	
dawn	prayer,	and	when	you	remove	your	
garments	in	the	afternoon,	and	after	the	night	prayer;	these	three	times	are	of	privacy	for	you;	
other	than	these	three	times,	it	is	no	sin	for	you	or	for	them;	moving	about	around	you	and	
among	each	other;	and	this	is	how	Allah	explains	the	verses	for	you;	and	Allah	is	All	Knowing,	
Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aye	Imān	wālo	chāhiye	ke	tumse	izn	leiñ	
tumhāre	hāth	ke	māl	ghulām	aur	woh	jo	
tum	meiñ	abhi	jawāni	ko	na	pahuñche	teen	waqt	namāz-e-subah	se	pehle	aur	jab	tum	apne	kapde	
utār	rakhte	ho	dopaher	ko	aur	Namāz-e-Ishā	ke	b’ad	yeh	teen	waqt	tumhāri	sharm	ke	haiñ	in	teen	
ke	b’ad	kuchh	gunāh	nahiñ	tumpar	na	unpar	āmad-o-raft	rakhte	haiñ	tumhāre	yahāñ	ek	doosre	
ke	pās	Allah	yuñhi	bayān	kartā	hai	tumhāre	liye	Āayateiñ	aur	Allah	‘Ilm-o-hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: وَإِذَا بَلَغَ ٱلْأَطْفَـٰلُ مِنكُمُ ٱلْحُلُمَ فَلْيَسْتَـْٔذِنُوا۟ كَمَا ٱسْتَـْٔذَنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	the	boys	among	you	reach	
adulthood,	then	they	too	must	seek	
permission	like	those	before	them	had	
sought;	this	is	how	Allah	explains	His	
verses	for	you;	and	Allah	is	All	Knowing,	
Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Aur	jab	tum	meiñ	ladke	jawāni	ko		pahuñch	
jāyeiñ	to	woh	bhi	iz’n	māngeiñ	jaise	unke	
agloñ	ne	iz’n	māngā	Allah	yuñhi	bayān	
farmātā	hai	tumse	apni	Āayateiñ	aur	Allah	
‘Ilm-o-hikmat		wāla	hai.

arabicText: وَٱلْقَوَٰعِدُ مِنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ٱلَّـٰتِى لَا يَرْجُونَ نِكَاحًۭا فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْهِنَّ جُنَاحٌ أَن يَضَعْنَ ثِيَابَهُنَّ غَيْرَ مُتَبَرِّجَـٰتٍۭ بِزِينَةٍۢ ۖ وَأَن يَسْتَعْفِفْنَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّهُنَّ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	old	women	residing	in	houses	
who	do	not	have	the	desire	of	marriage	-	
it	is	no	sin	upon	them	if	they	discard	their	
upper	coverings	provided	they	do	not	
display	their	adornment;	and	avoiding	
even	this	is	better	for	them;	and	Allah	is	
All	Hearing,	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	boodhi	khāna	nasheen	aurateiñ	
jinheiñ	nikāh	ki	ārzoo	nahiñ	unpar	kuchh	
gunāh	nahiñ	ke	apne	bālāyi	kapde	utār	
rakheiñ	jabke	singār	na	chamkāyeiñ	aur	is	
se	bhi	bachnā	unke	liye	aur	behtar	hai	aur	
Allah	suntā	jānta	hai

arabicText: لَّيْسَ عَلَى ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ حَرَجٌۭ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْأَعْرَجِ حَرَجٌۭ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْمَرِيضِ حَرَجٌۭ وَلَا عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَن تَأْكُلُوا۟ مِنۢ بُيُوتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ ءَابَآئِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ إِخْوَٰنِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَخَوَٰتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَعْمَـٰمِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ عَمَّـٰتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَخْوَٰلِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ خَـٰلَـٰتِكُمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكْتُم مَّفَاتِحَهُۥٓ أَوْ صَدِيقِكُمْ ۚ لَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَن تَأْكُلُوا۟ جَمِيعًا أَوْ أَشْتَاتًۭا ۚ فَإِذَا دَخَلْتُم بُيُوتًۭا فَسَلِّمُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ تَحِيَّةًۭ مِّنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ مُبَـٰرَكَةًۭ طَيِّبَةًۭ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
There	is	no	restriction	upon	the	blind	nor	
any	restraint	upon	the	lame	nor	any	
constraint	upon	the	sick	nor	on	any	
among	you	if	you	eat	from	your	houses,	or	
the	houses	of	your	fathers,	or	the	houses	
of	your	mothers,	or	the	houses	of	your	
brothers,	or	the	houses	of	your	sisters,	or	
the	houses	of	your	fathers’	brothers,	or	
the	houses	of	your	fathers’	sisters,	or	the	
houses	of	your	mothers’	brothers,	or	the	
houses	of	your	mothers’	sisters,	or	from	
the	houses	you	are	entrusted	the	keys	of,	
or	from	the	house	of	a	friend	–	there	is	no	
blame	upon	you	if	you	eat	together	or	apart;	therefore	when	you	enter	the	houses,	say	greetings	
to	your	people	–	the	excellent	prayer	at	the	time	of	meeting,	from	Allah,	blessed	and	pure;	this	
is	how	Allah	explains	the	verses	to	you	in	order	that	you	may	understand.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Na	andhe	par	tangi	aur	na	langde	par	
muzāiqah	aur	na	beemār	par	rok	aur	na	
tum	meiñ	kisi	par	ke	khāo	apni	aulād	ke	
ghar	yā	apne	bāp	ke	ghar	yā	apni	māñ	ke	
ghar	yā	apne	bhāiyoñ	ke	yahāñ	yā	apni	
behnoñ	ke	ghar	yā	apne	chachāoñ	ke	
yahāñ	yā	apni	phupiyoñ	ke	ghar	yā	apne	māmuoñ	ke	yahāñ	yā	apni	khālāoñ	ke	ghar	yā	jahān	ki	
kunjiyān	tumhāre	qabzeh	meiñ	haiñ	yā	apne	dost	ke	yahāñ	tumpar	koi	ilzām	nahiñ	ke	milkar	
khāo	ya	alag	alag	phir	jab	kisi	ghar	meiñ	jāo	to	apnoñ	ko	Salām	karo	milte	waqt	ki	acchi	Duā	Allah	
ke	pās	se	mubārak	pākizah	Allah	yuñhi	bayān	farmātā	hai	tumse	Āyateiñ	ke	tumheiñ	samjh	ho.

arabicText: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَإِذَا كَانُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍۢ جَامِعٍۢ لَّمْ يَذْهَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يَسْتَـْٔذِنُوهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَـْٔذِنُونَكَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۚ فَإِذَا ٱسْتَـْٔذَنُوكَ لِبَعْضِ شَأْنِهِمْ فَأْذَن لِّمَن شِئْتَ مِنْهُمْ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمُ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
The	believers	are	only	those	who	accept	
faith	in	Allah	and	His	Noble	Messenger	
and	when	they	are	present	with	the	Noble	
Messenger	upon	being	gathered	for	some	
task,	do	not	go	away	until	they	have	taken	
his	permission;	indeed	those	who	seek	
your	permission,	are	those	who	believe	in	
Allah	and	His	Noble	Messenger;	so	if	they	
seek	your	permission	for	some	affair	of	
theirs,	give	the	permission	to	whomever	
you	wish	among	them,	and	seek	Allah’s	
forgiveness	for	them;	indeed	Allah	is	Oft	
Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Imān	wāle	to	wohi	haiñ	jo	Allah	aur	uske	
Rasool	par	yaqeen	lāyeiñ	aur	jab	Rasool	ke	
pās	kisi	aise	kām	meiñ	hāzir	huye		ho	jiske	
liye	jam’a	kiye	gaye	hoñ	to	na	jāyeiñ	jab	tak	
unse	ijāzat	na	le	leiñ	woh	jo	tumse	Ijāzat	
māñgte		haiñ	wohi	haiñ	jo	Allah	aur	uske	
Rasool	par	Imān	lāte	haiñ	phir	jab	woh	
tumse	ijāzat	māngeiñ	apne	kisi	kām	ke	liye	
to	un	meiñ	jise	tum	chāho	ijāzat	de	do	aur	
unke	liye	Allah	se	māfi	māñgo	be-shak	
Allah	bakash	ne		wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: لَّا تَجْعَلُوا۟ دُعَآءَ ٱلرَّسُولِ بَيْنَكُمْ كَدُعَآءِ بَعْضِكُم بَعْضًۭا ۚ قَدْ يَعْلَمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَسَلَّلُونَ مِنكُمْ لِوَاذًۭا ۚ فَلْيَحْذَرِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُخَالِفُونَ عَنْ أَمْرِهِۦٓ أَن تُصِيبَهُمْ فِتْنَةٌ أَوْ يُصِيبَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
Do	not	presume	among	yourselves	the	
calling	of	the	Noble	Messenger	equal	to	
your	calling	one	another;	Allah	knows	
those	among	you	who	sneak	away	by	
some	pretext;	so	those	who	go	against	the	
orders	of	the	Noble	Messenger	must	fear	
that	a	calamity	may	strike	them	or	a	
painful	punishment	befall	them.	(To 
honour the Holy Prophet – peace and 
blessings be upon him – is part of faith. 
To disrespect him is blasphemy.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Rasool	ke	pukārne	ko	āpas	meiñ	aisā	na	
thehrā	lo	jaisā	tum	meiñ	ek	dusre	ko	
pukārtā	hai	be-shak	Allah	jānta	hai	jo	tum	
meiñ	chupke	nikal	jāte	haiñ	kisi	chiz	ki	ād	
lekar	to	dare	woh	jo	Rasool	ke	ḥukm	ke	
khilāf	karte	haiñ	ke	unheiñ	koi	fitna	
pahuñche	yā	unpar	dard-nāk	‘aƶāb		pade

arabicText: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ قَدْ يَعْلَمُ مَآ أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ وَيَوْمَ يُرْجَعُونَ إِلَيْهِ فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۢ
englishTranslationText:
Pay	heed!	Indeed	to	Allah	only	belong	
whatsoever	is	in	the	heavens	and	in	the	
earth;	He	knows	the	condition	you	are	in;	
and	on	the	Day	when	they	are	returned	to	
Him,	He	will	then	inform	them	of	
whatever	they	did;	and	Allah	knows	all	
things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Sunlo	be-shak	Allah	hi	ka	hai	jo	kuchh	
āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	meiñ	hai	be-shak	
woh	jānta	hai	jis	hāl	par	tum	ho	aur	us	deen	
ko	jis	meiñ	uski	taraf	phere	jāyeiñ	ge	to	
woh	unheiñ	batā	degā	jo	kuchh	unhoñ	ne	
kiya	aur	Allah	sab	kuchh	jānta	hai.

arabicText: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ ٱلْفُرْقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلْعَـٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
Most	Auspicious	is	He	Who	has	sent	down	the	Furqan	(the	Criterion	–	the	Holy	Qur’an)	upon	His	
chosen	bondman	for	him	to	be	a	Herald	of	Warning	to	the	entire	world.	(Prophet	Muhammad	–	
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him	–	is	the	Prophet	towards	all	mankind.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Badi	barkat		wāla	hai	woh	ke	jisne	utārā	Qur’ān	apne	bande	par	jo	sāre	jahān	ko	dar	sunāne		wāla	
ho

arabicText: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَمْ يَتَّخِذْ وَلَدًۭا وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ شَرِيكٌۭ فِى ٱلْمُلْكِ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍۢ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ تَقْدِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
The	One	to	Whom	belongs	the	kingship	of	the	heavens	and	of	the	earth,	and	has	not	chosen	a	
child,	and	has	no	partner	in	His	kingship,	and	He	has	created	everything	and	kept	it	in	proper	
measure.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jiske	liye	hai	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	ki	bādshāhat	aur	usne	na	ikhtiyār	farmāyā	bachcha	aur	
uski	saltanat	meiñ	koi	sājhi	(Shareek)	nahiñ	usne	har	chiz	paidā	karke	theek	andāze	par	rakhi

arabicText: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةًۭ لَّا يَخْلُقُونَ شَيْـًۭٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ لِأَنفُسِهِمْ ضَرًّۭا وَلَا نَفْعًۭا وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ مَوْتًۭا وَلَا حَيَوٰةًۭ وَلَا نُشُورًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	people	have	appointed	other	Gods	
besides	Him,	those	who	do	not	create	
anything	but	are	themselves	created,	and	
those	who	do	not	have	the	power	to	harm	
or	benefit	themselves,	and	who	do	not	
have	any	authority	over	death	or	life	nor	
over	resurrection.
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Logoñ	ne	Uske	siwā	aur	khudā	thahrā	liye	
ke	woh	kuchh	nahiñ	banāte	aur	khud	paidā	
kiye	gaye	haiñ	aur	khud	apni	jānoñ	ke	bure	
bhale	ke	mālik	nahiñ	aur	na	marne	ka	
ikhtiyār	na	jeene	ka	na	uthne	ka.

arabicText: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ إِفْكٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ وَأَعَانَهُۥ عَلَيْهِ قَوْمٌ ءَاخَرُونَ ۖ فَقَدْ جَآءُو ظُلْمًۭا وَزُورًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	the	disbelievers	said,	“This	is	nothing	
but	a	slur	he	has	fabricated	and	others	
have	helped	him	upon	it”;	so	indeed	the	
disbelievers	have	stooped	to	injustice	and	
lie.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kāfir	bole	yeh	to	nahiñ	magar	ek	
bohtān	jo	unhoñ	ne	banā	liyā	hai	aur	uspar	
aur	logoñ	ne	unheiñ	madad	di	hai	be-shak	
woh	ƶālim	aur	jhoot	par	āaye	aur	bole	
agloñ	ki	kahāniyāñ	haiñ

arabicText: وَقَالُوٓا۟ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ ٱكْتَتَبَهَا فَهِىَ تُمْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ بُكْرَةًۭ وَأَصِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	they	said,	“These	are	stories	of	the	
former	people,	which	he	has	written	
down,	so	they	are	read	to	him	morning	
and	evening.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	unhoñ	ne	likh	li	haiñ	to	woh	unpar	subah	
wa	shām	padi	jāti	haiñ

arabicText: قُلْ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِى يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“It	is	
sent	down	by	Him	Who	knows	all	the	
secrets	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth;	
indeed	He	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful."
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	usey	to	usne	utārā	hai	jo	
āasmānon	aur	zameen	ki	har	bāt	jānta	hai	
be-shak	woh	bakash	ne		wāla	maherbān	
hai.

arabicText: وَقَالُوا۟ مَالِ هَـٰذَا ٱلرَّسُولِ يَأْكُلُ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشِى فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ ۙ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مَلَكٌۭ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُۥ نَذِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
And	they	said,	“What	is	the	matter	with	
this	(Noble)	Messenger,	that	he	eats	food	
and	walks	in	the	markets?	Why	was	not	
an	angel	sent	down	along	with	him,	to	
give	warning	along	with	him?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	bole	us	Rasool	ko	kya	huā	khānā	khātā	
hai	aur	bāzāroñ	meiñ	chaltā	hai	kyuñ	na	
utārā	gayā	unke	sāth	koi	Farishta	ke	unke	
sāth	dar	sunātā

arabicText: وَقَالُوا۟ مَالِ هَـٰذَا ٱلرَّسُولِ يَأْكُلُ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشِى فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ ۙ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مَلَكٌۭ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُۥ نَذِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
And	they	said,	“What	is	the	matter	with	
this	(Noble)	Messenger,	that	he	eats	food	
and	walks	in	the	markets?	Why	was	not	
an	angel	sent	down	along	with	him,	to	
give	warning	along	with	him?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	bole	us	Rasool	ko	kya	huā	khānā	khātā	
hai	aur	bāzāroñ	meiñ	chaltā	hai	kyuñ	na	
utārā	gayā	unke	sāth	koi	Farishta	ke	unke	
sāth	dar	sunātā

arabicText: أَوْ يُلْقَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِ كَنزٌ أَوْ تَكُونُ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٌۭ يَأْكُلُ مِنْهَا ۚ وَقَالَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلًۭا مَّسْحُورًا
englishTranslationText:
“Or	that	he	should	have	obtained	a	hidden	
treasure,	or	should	have	had	a	garden	from	which	to	eat”;	and	the	unjust	said,	“You	do	not	
follow	but	a	man	under	a	magic	spell.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Yā	ghaib	se	inheiñ	koi	khazāna	mil	jātā	yā	
inkā	koi	bāgh	hotā	jis	meiñ	se	khāte	aur	
zālim	bole	tum	to	pairvi	nahiñ	karte	magar	
aise	mard	ki	jispar	jādu	huā

arabicText: ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ ضَرَبُوا۟ لَكَ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلَ فَضَلُّوا۟ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
O	dear	Prophet	(Muhammad	–	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	see	how	they	invent	examples	
for	you	-	they	have	therefore	gone	astray,	unable	find	a	road.		O	dear	Prophet	(Muhammad	–	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	see	how	they	invent	examples	
for	you	-	they	have	therefore	gone	astray,	unable	find	a	road.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aye	Mahboob	dekho	kaisi	kahāwateiñ	tumhāre	liye	banā	rahe	haiñ	to	gumrāh	huye	ke	ab	koi	rāh	
nahiñ	pāte

arabicText: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِىٓ إِن شَآءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيْرًۭا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ وَيَجْعَل لَّكَ قُصُورًۢا
englishTranslationText:
Most	Auspicious	is	He	Who,	if	He	wills,	may	make	it	much	better	for	you	-	Gardens	beneath	
which	rivers	flow,	and	may	create	high	palaces	for	you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Badi	barkat	wāla	hai	woh	ke	agar	chāhe	to	tumhāre	liye	bahut	behtar	is	se	karde	Jannateiñ	jin	ke	
niche	nehreiñ	baheiñ	aur	karegā	tumhāre	liye	ūñche	ūñche	mahel.

arabicText: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
In	fact	they	deny	the	Last	Day;	and	We	have	kept	prepared	a	blazing	fire	for	those	who	deny	the	
Last	Day.
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Balke	yeh	to	Qayāmat	ko	jhutlā	te	haiñ	aur	jo	Qayāmat	ko	jhutlāyeiñ	hamne	uske	Liye	tayyar	kar	
rakhi	hai	bhadakti	huyi	āag.

arabicText: إِذَا رَأَتْهُم مِّن مَّكَانٍۭ بَعِيدٍۢ سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا تَغَيُّظًۭا وَزَفِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
When	it	will	see	them	from	afar,	they	will	
hear	its	raging	and	roaring.
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Jab	woh	unheiñ	door	jagah	se	dekhegi	to	
suneñge	uskā	josh	mārnā	aur	chiñghādnā

arabicText: وَإِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ مِنْهَا مَكَانًۭا ضَيِّقًۭا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوْا۟ هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	when	they	are	thrown	into	a	narrow	
place	in	it,	bound	in	chains,	they	will	pray	
for	death	in	it.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	uski	kisi	tang	jagāh	meiñ	dāle	
jāyeiñ	ge	zanjeeroñ	meiñ	jakde	huye		to	
wahāñ	maut	māñgeñ	ge

arabicText: لَّا تَدْعُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ثُبُورًۭا وَٰحِدًۭا وَٱدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًۭا كَثِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
It	will	be	said	“Do	not	pray	this	day	for	
one	death	–	and	pray	for	many	deaths.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Farmāyā	jayegā	āaj	ek	maut	na	māñgo	aur	
bahut	si	mauteiñ	māñgo

arabicText: قُلْ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ أَمْ جَنَّةُ ٱلْخُلْدِ ٱلَّتِى وُعِدَ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ ۚ كَانَتْ لَهُمْ جَزَآءًۭ وَمَصِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“Is	this	better	or	the	Everlasting	
Gardens	which	are	promised	to	those	who	
fear?	That	is	their	reward	and	their	
outcome.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Tum	farmāo	kyā	yeh	bhalā	ya	woh	
hameshgi	ke	bāgh	jiskā	w’āda	Dar	wāloñ	
ko	hai	woh	unkā	sila	aur	anjām	hai.

arabicText: لَّهُمْ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَـٰلِدِينَ ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعْدًۭا مَّسْـُٔولًۭا
englishTranslationText:
“In	it	for	them	is	all	that	they	may	desire,	
abiding	in	it	for	ever;	a	promise	
incumbent	upon	your	Lord,	that	is	prayed	
for.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unke	liye	wahāñ	man	māni	murādeiñ	haiñ	
jin	meiñ	hamesha	raheñge	tumhāre	Rab	ke	
zimme	w’āda	hai	māñgā	huā

arabicText: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَقُولُ ءَأَنتُمْ أَضْلَلْتُمْ عِبَادِى هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَمْ هُمْ ضَلُّوا۟ ٱلسَّبِيلَ
englishTranslationText:
And	on	the	day	when	He	will	assemble	
them	and	all	what	they	worship	instead	of	
Allah	-	then	will	say	to	those	deities,	“Did	
you	mislead	my	bondmen	or	did	they	
themselves	forget	the	path?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jis	din	ek-kattha	karegā	unheiñ	aur	
jinko	Allah	ke	siwā	poojte	haiñ	phir	un	
m’aboodoñ	se	farmāyegā	kya	tumne	
gumrāh	kardiye	yeh	mere	bande	yā	yeh	khud	hi	rāh	bhoole

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ مَا كَانَ يَنۢبَغِى لَنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ مِن دُونِكَ مِنْ أَوْلِيَآءَ وَلَـٰكِن مَّتَّعْتَهُمْ وَءَابَآءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَسُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۢا بُورًۭا
englishTranslationText:
They	will	submit,	“Purity	is	to	You	-	it	was	
not	rightful	for	us	to	appoint	any	Master	
besides	You;	but	You	gave	them	and	their	
forefathers	usage	to	the	extent	that	they	
forgot	Your	Remembrance;	and	they	were	
indeed	the	people	who	destroy	themselves.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	‘arz	kareñge	pāki	hai	tujhko	hameiñ	sazāwār	(Haq)	na	thā	ke	tere	siwā	kisi	aur	ko	maulā	
banāyeiñ	lekin	toone	unheiñ	aur	unke	bāp	dādāoñ	ko	baratne	diyā	yahāñ	tak	ki	woh	teri	yād	
bhool	gaye	aur	yeh	log	hi	halāk	hone	wāle

arabicText: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوكُم بِمَا تَقُولُونَ فَمَا تَسْتَطِيعُونَ صَرْفًۭا وَلَا نَصْرًۭا ۚ وَمَن يَظْلِم مِّنكُمْ نُذِقْهُ عَذَابًۭا كَبِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
“So	the	deities	have	belied	what	you	state	-	so	now	you	can	neither	avert	the	punishment	nor	
help	yourself;	and	whoever	among	you	is	unjust,	We	shall	make	him	taste	a	terrible	
punishment.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	ab	m’āboodoñ	ne	tumhāri	bāt	jhutlādi	to	ab	tum	na	‘aƶāb	pher	sako	na	apni	madad	kar	sako	
aur	tum	meiñ	jo	zālim	hai	Ham	usey	badā	‘aƶāb	chakhāyeñ	ge.

arabicText: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا قَبْلَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ إِلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ لَيَأْكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشُونَ فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ ۗ وَجَعَلْنَا بَعْضَكُمْ لِبَعْضٍۢ فِتْنَةً أَتَصْبِرُونَ ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ بَصِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	all	the	Noble	Messengers	We	sent	before	you	were	like	this	–	eating	food	and	walking	in	
the	markets;	and	We	have	made	some	of	you	a	test	for	others;	so	will	you,	O	people,	patiently	
endure?	And	O	dear	Prophet,	your	Lord	is	All	Seeing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Hamne	tumse	pehle	jitne	Rasool	bheje	sab	aise	hi	the	khānā	khāte	aur	bāzāroñ	meiñ	chalte	
aur	Hamne	tum	meiñ	ek	ko	doosre	ki	jāñch	kiya	hai	aur	aye	logoñ	kya	tum	sabr	karoge	aur	aye	
Mehboob	tumhārā	Rab	dekhtā	hai.
